title: Media Call: RAND Experts Discuss Upcoming NATO Summit
descriptions: RAND experts will discuss the upcoming NATO Summit in Vilnius, Lithuania. Topics of conversation include NATO's continued support for Ukraine, strengthening the alliance's overall defense and deterrence, the addition of Finland as a NATO member, and the potential accession of Sweden. The summit takes place July 11–12, 2023.

image.desc: A NATO flag flutters at the Tapa military base, Estonia April 30, 2023, photo. by Ints Kalnins/Reuters

sub_content.What: RAND experts will discuss the upcoming NATO Summit in Vilnius, Lithuania. Topics of conversation include NATO's continued support for Ukraine, strengthening the alliance's overall defense and deterrence, the addition of Finland as a NATO member, and the potential accession of Sweden. The summit takes place July 11–12, 2023.

sub_content.Where: To join this virtual conversation, please contact media@rand.org for a link.

sub_content.Interviews:
